review_title: Company with a great corporate culture
job_title: HR Business Partner in Montreal, QC
pros: Good benefit package; Corporate perks; Knowledgeable and supportive colleagues; Recently renovated fancy office and much more.

cons: There are no cons in workplace!

review_title: Great workplace, motivating cause and passionate colleagues
pros:
- Motivating cause
- Family-like feel
- International organization (semi governmental) but yet an entrepreneur spirit
- Flexible working arrangements (working from home)
- Competitive salaries
cons: Some backlash (depending on the position / scope of employees' responsibilities) because of the negative perception by some externals of the organization's purpose

pros: stability, challenging, international agency, non profit organization.
cons: Salary, work life balance, Human Resources.

pros: I have been at WADA for 5 weeks and I am so happy to have chosen to be part of their organization. The HR and Corporate Services' teams are so welcoming and very professional. I am looking forward to meeting everyone else and to stay for many years. Thank you for this opportunity !
cons: I do not see any cons.

review_title: A great company to learn and grow
job_title: Quality Assurance Tester in Montreal, QC
pros:
Great leaders from whom you can learn the best practices going in the industry
Mentorship trainings
Great ramping-up process to get you on board as quickly as possible
cons: I really can't think of any negatives.

pros:
- Good work ethics and high degree of trust 
- Opportunity to work in a flexible work environment
- Give you the best support, generous with their time
- Structured training plan for new team member
- Support personal and professional development 
- Value teamwork and good communication
- Willingness to share their experience and to help others
- Very inspiring and motivating director and managers
cons: More opportunities to get in touch with people from other teams, to understand how areas of work are connected so we can work better would be very much appreciated

review_title: Support for staff is a key focus
pros:
Onboarding program includes a buddy system to help with the transition.
The working culture of the organization continues to move towards optimizing efficient ways of working,
cons: It's too early to say. I started during the pandemic. To identify cons would be unfair and not reflective of where the organization will be in 2022.

pros:
Awesome benefits 
Great culture 
Organized 
Good salary rate
cons: From my last experiences I have nothing bad to say about WADA so far.

pros: Multi cultural; good mission and passionate colleagues
cons: Some transparency is missing. Still young in terms of processes.

job_title: Software QA/Automation Engineer in Montreal, QC
pros: Great experience. Friendly work environment. Lots of vacation
cons: Less technical exposure. Lot of work pressure due to working in small team

job_title: Human Resources Talent Manager in Montreal, QC
pros: Friendly colleagues, great benefits, good work life balance and very interesting challenging projects to work on.
cons: Many changes going on, but this is a good sign of improvements.

pros: Great colleagues. Everyone is respectful. Very human management style.
Makes you feel good till they hire you
cons: Lack of ethics, professionalism. Highly judgmental and management works in mysterious ways .

pros: Benefits, some pay, occasional office parties
cons:
Top leaders in the executive office, investigations and human resources area have no form of integrity. They are master manipulators that will ruin good employees through illegal HR practices and will do anything to protect themselves and others that conduct poor unlawful and unethical behaviour. 

They lie to employees saying that there is a low turnover rate. The people who stay are those who feel like they cannot afford to leave.

pros: Small non-profit organization that has grown significantly in size in recent years. Very diverse workforce. Dedicated group of people with a common objective. Friendly work and professional work environment. Good pay and benefits.
cons: Lack of working from home or flex work option.

pros: Interesting work, diverse / international atmosphere, good pay and benefits for some, nice office space and frequent parties.
cons: Nice place to work on the surface, but very inflexible rules and atmosphere that lacks trust. Lots of turnover especially in certain departments. Zero tolerance for staff or consultants who question unfair, or flat-out illegal HR practices, while Directors enjoy full immunity. No transparency and blatant nepotism.
